description:
Fetches a random wallpaper from an online source and sets it as desktop background. 
The desktop background can be updated periodically or manually.

Features:
* Many different online sources with (Unsplash, Wallhaven, Reddit, JSON API/File)
* History of previous images
* Set lock screen image
* Automatic renewal (interval and on startup)
